AMAZON LISTING

A well-made Amazon listing from the first time is your pass to huge sales. A team of 5 people who have together created more than 500 Amazon pages will work on your listing.

What you get

Conversion Increase

An impressive main image will increase the number of clicks on your product page.

Better Rating

Relevant texts and keywords increase the rating of your product in organic search results.

Higher Sales

The right presentation of product advantages increases the trust of a potential buyer.

An Expert Advisor

Our professional team made listings for more than 500 products for hundreds sellers.

Individual Approach

A team of specialists takes into account all the client’s wishes and makes effective suggestions.

High Professionalism

A whole team of more than 10 people of higher qualification in their specialties works on every project.

What is included?

  • 1

    Product analysis

    An analyst gathers information about the product, studies the niche and competitors.

  • 2

    Keywords

    PPC-specialist selects 150-200 keywords.

  • 3

    Texts

    The English-speaking copywriter writes titles, bullets, and description.

  • 4

    Product photo session

    A professional photo session in a studio and editing.

  • 5

    Graphic design

    High-quality and creative design which lets your product stand out from competitors.

  • 6

    Uploading on Amazon

    After content is verified, a competent manager uploads it on Amazon.

Portfolio

Leave a Request

It will take you less than sixty seconds. A member of our team will contact you shortly after.
